name: This Is Just Life
description:
This is a game made for the GMTK game jam(Theme: Out Of Control)

You have just moved out of your parents house. How long will you survive? One mistake can make your stable life out of control and into a downward spiral of death.

How To Play:

Go to the computer and go on the job icon to get money. Use the money to buy food to keep your hunger up. Go to bed to keep your energy up. Watch YouTube to keep you sanity up. Go to the toilet if you need to poo. You die when your health reaches 0. If your sanity is 0 you will get a random disadvantage. If your hunger is 0 you will start to lose health. If your energy is 0 you can't use the computer. If you don't poo in time you will lose health.
